title: MWIC Bonus Episode 5: Autocar meets Ineos Automotive CEO Lynn Calder
description: Autocar's Editor-at-large Matt Prior talks to Ineos CEO Lynn Calder about the 4x4 company's future In this bonus podcast, Autocar's Editor-at-large, Matt Prior, meets the Ineos Automotive CEO Lynn Calder. Speaking at Ineos's Hambach factory, Calder tells Prior about the Grenadier 4x4, why its Fusilier follow-up is paused, and why running a car company is 'ageing'. Make sure you never miss an Autocar podcast. Subscribe to our podcasts via Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Podcasts or via your preferred podcast platform. And if you subscribe, rate and review the pod, we'd really appreciate that too.

html:
Autocar's Editor-at-large Matt Prior talks to Ineos CEO Lynn Calder about the 4x4 company's future

Close

In this bonus podcast, Autocar's Editor-at-large, Matt Prior, meets the Ineos Automotive CEO Lynn Calder. Speaking at Ineos's Hambach factory, Calder tells Prior about the Grenadier 4x4, why its Fusilier follow-up is paused, and why running a car company is 'ageing'.
